lines.speaker: FrogGuy
lines.text: i need you to find a red mushroom in the forest west of here

lines.speaker: FrogGuy
lines.text: but be careful, there's some bad stuff in there

lines.speaker: FrogGuy
lines.text: remember, west of here(over the bridge), find the red mushroom

lines.speaker: FrogGuy
lines.text: well i supppose you need a sword, go find the old master on the snowy mountain east of here
